text: The New Hampshire Regiment was formed when the 1st New Hampshire Regiment was redesignated on 1 March 1783 of nine companies of volunteers. The regiment was consolidated with the New Hampshire Battalion (2nd New Hampshire Regiment) on 22 June 1783 as five companies and re-designated as the New Hampshire Battalion. ==See also== *1st New Hampshire Regiment *5th Continental Regiment *New Hampshire Battalion ==References== * ==External links== *Bibliography of the Continental Army in New Hampshire compiled by the United States Army Center of Military History New Hampshire Regiment Category:Military units and formations established in 1783 Category:Military units and formations disestablished in 1783
title: New Hampshire Regiment
